title: Provide Manual Product Recommendation
description: A customer asks a support agent for a recommendation for a running shoe for a specific type of terrain.

tasks.description: Understand the customer's needs (terrain: trail, usage: long-distance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the key requirements.

tasks.description: Filter the product catalog for 'running shoes' with the tag 'trail' and 'high-cushion'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of suitable products.

tasks.description: Recommend the top-rated shoe from the filtered list and explain why it's a good fit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a relevant, well-justified recommendation.
